layman_description: This item copies stats and settings from another item, then overrides the specific values shown.
technical_description: Points to another item whose values are copied and merged with local overrides.
player_impact: Creates variants that behave like the base item but with small changes.

layman_description: Controls where this block shows in the building menu compared to other blocks.
technical_description: Secondary ordering value used by the game's menu placement logic.
player_impact: Affects how quickly you find this block when browsing menus.

layman_description: The color tint applied to this item's picture in inventory and menus.
technical_description: Color value applied to the item picture at display time.
player_impact: Helps visually distinguish similar items or variants.

layman_description: Which picture is shown for this item in your inventory and menus.
technical_description: Name of the picture resource used by inventory and menus.
player_impact: Changes how easy the item is to recognize at a glance.

layman_description: Whether the item appears in the creative menu or is hidden.
technical_description: Controls visibility of this item in creative-mode lists.
player_impact: Hidden items won't appear in creative menus but still exist in the game.

layman_description: A color overlay applied to how the item or block looks in the world or menus.
technical_description: Color value used as an overlay for models or pictures.
player_impact: Can make items easier or harder to spot depending on the tint.

layman_description: The 3D shape you see when this block is placed in the world.
technical_description: Path to a 3D model file or game object used for rendering and collision.
player_impact: Determines the block's appearance and how it interacts physically.

layman_description: Labels that decide which menus or filters this block appears in.
technical_description: Comma-separated tag strings used to categorize blocks for filtering.
player_impact: Affects whether the block shows up in specific building menus or search filters.

layman_description: Primary control for where this block appears in the building menu.
technical_description: Primary ordering value for catalog/menu placement.
player_impact: Changes menu placement and how quickly you find the block.

layman_description: What the item or block is made of, which affects how it breaks and what tools work best.
technical_description: Links to material settings that determine durability and interactions.
player_impact: Determines how hard it is to break and which tools are most effective.

layman_description: A label that groups similar items together like putting all axes or all melee weapons in the same category.
technical_description: Comma-separated identifier list that enables batch filtering and categorization across item, block, and entity definitions.
player_impact: Determines which perks and modifiers affect your equipment and what counts for quest objectives.

layman_description: The lookup name that tells the game which help text to show when you hover over an item in your inventory.
technical_description: Localization key that maps to the displayed description text for items and blocks across all language files.
player_impact: Shows you what an item does and how to use it when you examine it in menus.

layman_description: The behavior type that tells an item how it works, like whether it's a weapon, tool, or food.
technical_description: Defines the core functionality handler that determines item behavior, action types, and interaction patterns.
player_impact: Controls what happens when you click or use an item in your hand.

layman_description: The 3D shape type of a block that determines how it looks and fits with other blocks.
technical_description: Geometry type identifier that defines collision mesh, rendering method, and placement constraints for block entities.
Affects which shapes you can build with and how blocks connect to each other.

layman_description: Controls whether water can flow through or around this block.
technical_description: Bitflag setting that defines permitted water flow directions through block faces for fluid simulation.
player_impact: Determines if you can use this block to control or redirect water in your base.

layman_description: The small picture shown in the corner of an item's inventory icon to show what category it belongs to.
technical_description: Icon identifier displayed as an overlay badge on inventory slots to indicate item classification and sorting group.
player_impact: Helps you quickly identify item types when scanning through large inventories or chests.

layman_description: How far the block's 3D shape is shifted from its normal position in the game world.
technical_description: Vector offset applied to block model positioning relative to its grid coordinate for visual alignment.
player_impact: Makes certain decorative blocks sit properly on surfaces or align with other building pieces.

layman_description: The way your character holds and shows this item in their hands.
technical_description: Animation rig identifier that determines held pose, attachment points, and movement animations for equipped items.
player_impact: Changes how you see the item when equipped and what animations play when you use it.

layman_description: The base price value used when buying from or selling to traders.
technical_description: Base trader price before stage multipliers and negotiation skill modifiers are applied.
player_impact: Determines how many dukes you get for selling this item or need to spend buying it from traders.

layman_description: The size in blocks that this object takes up when placed in the world.
technical_description: Dimension array defining how many block spaces this entity occupies in X, Y, Z grid coordinates.
player_impact: Tells you how much space you need to clear before placing large objects like workbenches or vehicles.

layman_description: The inventory tab category where this item appears in your crafting menu and storage containers.
technical_description: Menu category assignment that controls item sorting, tab placement, and filter organization in inventory menus.
player_impact: Determines which tab you'll find the item under when searching your backpack or storage boxes.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you pick up this item from the ground or a container.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered when the item is added to player inventory from world or container source.
player_impact: Gives audio feedback when you successfully loot or collect an item.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you set down or drop this item from your inventory.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered when the item is removed from inventory and placed into world or container.
player_impact: Makes a satisfying sound when you drop or transfer items to confirm the action worked.

layman_description: The actual item you receive when opening or using this container or bundle.
technical_description: Item identifier that specifies the loot table entry or direct item spawn when this consumable is activated.
player_impact: Determines what pops into your inventory when you open ammo boxes or crafting bundles.

layman_description: How many items you get when you open this bundle or container.
technical_description: Quantity value for items spawned when bundle or container is consumed, supports range notation.
player_impact: Tells you how many bullets or resources appear when you use ammo packs or resource bundles.

layman_description: What this block turns into when you break it down one level instead of destroying it completely.
technical_description: Block identifier that replaces current block when structural damage threshold is reached or downgrade action is performed.
player_impact: Lets you turn secure doors back into insecure ones or carefully demolish structures without destroying them.

layman_description: The loot table name that determines what items can spawn inside this container or corpse.
technical_description: Loot group identifier that references XML loot probability tables for item generation.
player_impact: Controls the types and rarity of items you find when searching containers or looting bodies.

layman_description: How this block automatically rotates or positions itself when you place it in the world.
technical_description: Placement behavior mode that controls automatic rotation and orientation relative to player position and block faces.
player_impact: Makes doors and spotlights automatically face toward you when placed for easier building.

layman_description: What types of things can hit or pass through this block like bullets, melee attacks, or players.
technical_description: Collision layer mask defining which physics interactions are permitted with this block's collision geometry.
player_impact: Determines if you can shoot through bars, walk through tall grass, or if zombies can reach through gaps.

layman_description: What information appears when you look at this block in the world, like its name or custom description.
technical_description: Info display mode that controls which text elements appear in the block inspection tooltip.
player_impact: Shows you helpful details about blocks like storage names or machine status when you aim at them.

layman_description: The maximum number of these items that can fit in one inventory slot.
technical_description: Maximum stack size limit for item quantity consolidation within a single inventory slot.
player_impact: Determines how efficiently you can store items and how much inventory space they consume.

layman_description: The simplified distant version of this block that appears when you're far away to improve game performance.
technical_description: Low-poly mesh identifier used for distant LOD rendering to reduce draw calls and improve frame rates.
player_impact: Keeps your game running smoothly by showing simpler versions of blocks at a distance.

layman_description: The total amount of damage this block can take before it's completely destroyed.
technical_description: Maximum hit point threshold before block destruction event triggers and block is removed from world.
player_impact: Shows how tough a block is and how much effort it takes to break through walls or destroy obstacles.

layman_description: Whether this block is natural decoration like grass or rocks that spawns with the landscape.
technical_description: Boolean flag indicating if block is placed by terrain generation and can be replaced by player-placed blocks.
player_impact: Means you can build over this block without needing to clear it first, and it won't respawn.

layman_description: The 3D shape file that defines what this item looks like when held or viewed in the world.
technical_description: File path to the 3D model asset used for item world representation and first-person held rendering.
player_impact: Determines the visual appearance and animations of the item when you equip it.

layman_description: Whether this block can support other blocks above it or if it will collapse without support underneath.
technical_description: Boolean indicating if block contributes to structural integrity calculations for adjacent blocks in stability system.
player_impact: Determines if you can build on top of this block or if it needs solid ground beneath it.

layman_description: The specific animation style your character uses when holding this item.
technical_description: Animation set identifier that maps to character bone transforms and IK constraints for item positioning.
player_impact: Makes your character hold pistols differently than rifles or torches for realistic movement.

layman_description: Whether this block blocks zombie pathfinding or allows them to consider walking through it.
technical_description: AI navigation flag that controls whether this block is considered passable or blocking for pathfinding algorithms.
player_impact: Affects whether zombies try to walk around or through blocks when chasing you.

layman_description: How many different random items this bundle will give you when opened.
technical_description: Number of random selection rolls performed from the random item pool when bundle is consumed.
player_impact: Tells you how many surprise items you'll get from loot bags or mystery packages.

layman_description: The list of possible items this bundle might randomly give you when opened.
technical_description: Comma-separated pool of item identifiers for random selection when bundle generates loot.
player_impact: Shows what kinds of items you might get lucky and receive from randomized loot.

layman_description: How many of each random item you receive from this bundle.
technical_description: Quantity assigned to each randomly selected item from the random pool, supports range notation.
player_impact: Determines if you get single mods or multiple resources when opening randomized bundles.

layman_description: The picture number that defines what surface image appears on each face of this block.
technical_description: Texture atlas index mapping for block face materials from the consolidated texture sheet.
player_impact: Makes blocks look like wood, concrete, metal, or other materials with correct visual appearance.

layman_description: Whether players can spawn this creature through console commands or special menus.
technical_description: Spawn permission level that controls which interfaces can instantiate this entity in the game world.
player_impact: Determines if admins or creative mode can summon this entity for testing or events.

layman_description: The 3D shape file or rendering style used to display this entity or block in the world.
technical_description: Rendering layer assignment or model file path that defines geometry and material rendering pipeline.
player_impact: Controls the visual appearance and rendering quality of entities and special blocks.

layman_description: Which item modifications become available in your crafting menu after you learn to craft this item.
technical_description: Comma-separated list of mod recipe identifiers that become visible when this item recipe is learned.
player_impact: Reading weapon books unlocks new weapon mods you can craft and attach to your guns.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you begin using this tool or weapon.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered at the start of the item's primary action or attack animation.
player_impact: Makes your swings, shots, and tool uses sound realistic with appropriate audio feedback.

layman_description: A special tag used for quests and challenges that need to track specific block types.
technical_description: Quest objective identifier that enables tracking and counting of this block type for mission completion.
player_impact: Lets quests detect when you destroy specific blocks or collect resources from tagged sources.

layman_description: The perk or recipe book you must learn before this item appears in your crafting menu.
technical_description: Recipe unlock requirement identifier that gates crafting menu visibility until prerequisite is satisfied.
player_impact: Forces you to invest perk points or read books before you can craft advanced items.

layman_description: The 3D shape that appears on the ground when you drop this item from your inventory.
technical_description: Model file path for the dropped item world entity that appears when item is ejected from inventory.
player_impact: Makes dropped items look correct on the ground so you can find them easily.

layman_description: How much this block reduces brightness when light tries to pass through it.
technical_description: Light attenuation value that reduces illumination intensity for light rays passing through this block.
player_impact: Affects how dark rooms get when you block windows and how far light spreads through structures.

layman_description: The 3D shape file that shows what your armor or vehicle looks like in the game world.
technical_description: Model asset path for equipped appearance on character rig or spawned vehicle entity geometry.
player_impact: Determines the visual appearance of armor on your character or how vehicles look when placed.

layman_description: Which trader inventory tier this item belongs to so it appears at the right player level.
technical_description: Trader tier identifier that controls item availability based on player level and trader stage progression.
player_impact: Makes better items appear in trader inventories as you level up and progress through the game.

layman_description: Whether the simplified distant version of this block allows zombies and bullets to pass through it.
technical_description: Boolean flag that disables collision on distant LOD geometry to prevent phantom collision issues.
player_impact: Prevents invisible walls when simplified block versions are displayed at long distances.

layman_description: The time in seconds between when you can use this item repeatedly.
technical_description: Cooldown duration in seconds between consecutive action activations for rate limiting.
player_impact: Controls how fast you can swing weapons or use tools before the next action is ready.

layman_description: How many iron ingots you need to craft this item or get back when scrapping it.
technical_description: Forged iron resource count for crafting recipe requirements and salvage yield calculations.
player_impact: Determines the iron cost to craft advanced items and how much you recover when breaking them down.

layman_description: How many pounds this item weighs in your inventory, affecting your movement speed when overloaded.
technical_description: Mass value in inventory weight units that contributes to encumbrance calculations and movement speed penalties.
player_impact: Heavy items slow you down when carrying too much, forcing inventory management decisions.

layman_description: Which body part or armor slot this item is worn on.
technical_description: Equipment slot identifier that determines valid attachment point on player character rig.
player_impact: Restricts where you can equip armor so you can wear one helmet and one chest piece at once.

layman_description: How many experience points you earn for killing this creature.
technical_description: Base XP value awarded to player on entity death before multipliers and bonuses are applied.
player_impact: Tougher enemies give more experience to help you level up faster when hunting dangerous creatures.

layman_description: The armor set name that gives bonuses when wearing multiple pieces from the same collection.
technical_description: Set identifier that enables matching piece detection for armor set bonus calculations.
player_impact: Completing full armor sets grants special bonuses beyond individual piece protection values.

layman_description: Which other equipment slots become blocked when you equip this item.
technical_description: Slot mask that defines which equipment positions are automatically cleared when this item is equipped.
player_impact: Some items prevent wearing other gear, like full helmets that remove your hair or hat cosmetics.

layman_description: Which body part this armor attaches to for proper positioning on your character.
technical_description: Character rig bone name used as attachment point for armor mesh positioning and animation.
player_impact: Makes armor pieces follow your character movements correctly and stay attached to the right body parts.

layman_description: Whether traders will accept this item when you try to sell it to them.
technical_description: Boolean flag controlling if item appears as valid option in trader sell interface.
player_impact: Quest items and special loot can't be sold, preventing accidental disposal of important items.

layman_description: How many items are packaged together when you buy this in bulk from traders.
technical_description: Quantity multiplier applied to trader purchase transactions for resource bundles and bulk goods.
player_impact: Lets you buy ammo and resources in convenient stacks instead of one at a time from traders.

layman_description: The invisible weapon this creature uses to determine its melee attack damage and effects.
technical_description: Item identifier that defines attack stats, damage types, and special effects for entity melee attacks.
player_impact: Different zombie fist types cause bleeding, infection, or extra damage when they hit you.

layman_description: How much wood you need to craft this block or get back when destroying it.
technical_description: Wood resource count for crafting recipe requirements and harvesting yield calculations.
player_impact: Shows the wood cost to build structures and how much wood you recover when dismantling them.

layman_description: Prevents getting duplicate items from this loot bundle, giving you variety instead of repeats.
technical_description: Boolean flag that enforces unique selection constraint when rolling multiple random items from the pool.
player_impact: Guarantees you won't get the same mod or book twice when opening skill magazines or mod bundles.

layman_description: Which side of the block the door handle or interactive part appears on.
technical_description: Block face identifier that determines placement and orientation of interaction hotspot and visual elements.
player_impact: Makes doors and switches have handles on the correct side for intuitive interaction.

layman_description: The visual and sound effects that play when this block downgrades or breaks to the next damage level.
technical_description: Effect identifier for particle systems and audio events triggered during block downgrade transitions.
player_impact: Provides satisfying feedback when breaking down doors or damaging structures with visual destruction.

layman_description: Allows bullets and melee hits to pass through this block and damage things behind it.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling damage raycast continuation through block collision for penetration mechanics.
player_impact: Lets you shoot through bars, fences, and weak materials to hit enemies on the other side.

layman_description: Invisible box that's larger than the block's visible size, used for special collision or interaction areas.
technical_description: Extended bounding box dimensions beyond visual mesh for enlarged collision detection or interaction zones.
player_impact: Makes large objects easier to click on and prevents walking through oversized decorative blocks.

layman_description: The chance that this creature will drop a loot bag when killed.
technical_description: Probability value between 0 and 1 that determines if loot container spawns on entity death.
player_impact: Higher values mean enemies are more likely to drop backpacks with extra items beyond basic loot.

layman_description: How the block's surface pictures align with neighboring blocks for seamless patterns.
technical_description: Texture mapping mode that controls whether UVs are local to block or aligned to world grid coordinates.
player_impact: Makes concrete and metal textures flow continuously across multiple blocks without visible seams.

layman_description: A special category label used to identify blocks for game mechanics like quest tracking or upgrade paths.
technical_description: Semantic identifier enabling gameplay systems to detect and categorize blocks for special handling.
player_impact: Lets the game recognize tree trunks for woodcutting quests or doors for upgrade prompts.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you close this door, lid, or container.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered when block transitions to closed state after interaction.
player_impact: Provides satisfying audio feedback confirming doors and containers closed properly.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you open this door, lid, or container.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered when block transitions to open state after interaction.
player_impact: Gives audio confirmation that you successfully opened doors, chests, and workstations.

layman_description: Restricts this block to only face the four main directions instead of rotating freely in all angles.
technical_description: Boolean flag limiting block orientation to 90-degree increments around vertical axis only.
player_impact: Makes building faster by snapping blocks to cardinal directions without complex rotation adjustments.

layman_description: How far away from other decorations this large natural object must be when spawning during world generation.
technical_description: Minimum distance in blocks enforced between large decoration spawns during terrain generation to prevent clustering.
player_impact: Prevents trees and boulders from spawning too close together, making terrain look more natural.

layman_description: Which loot table determines what items drop from this creature's backpack when you kill it.
technical_description: Loot group identifier for items spawned in dropped backpack container on entity death.
player_impact: Controls what loot zombies drop when killed, with different types dropping profession-specific items.

layman_description: How much stunning resistance this creature builds up each time you hit it before it stops flinching.
technical_description: Pain state accumulation value that reduces stagger chance on subsequent hits until immunity threshold is reached.
player_impact: Tougher zombies stop flinching after a few hits, requiring different combat tactics than weak enemies.

layman_description: How the block's 3D appearance changes to show cracked or broken versions as it takes damage.
technical_description: Damage threshold mapping to alternate mesh states for visual degradation feedback during block destruction.
player_impact: Provides visual feedback showing how damaged structures are so you can see weak points before they collapse.

layman_description: Whether the block shows its 3D shape when falling after losing support, or just becomes invisible rubble.
technical_description: Boolean flag controlling if falling block entity uses full model or simplified falling particle representation.
player_impact: Makes collapsing structures look realistic with visible falling blocks instead of disappearing instantly.

layman_description: The special glowing color effect applied to this zombie variant like green, blue, or orange.
technical_description: Material shader variant identifier that applies emission color and special visual effects to entity textures.
player_impact: Makes special zombies visually distinctive so you can identify dangerous variants from a distance.

layman_description: Lets you rotate this block in all possible directions including upside down and sideways.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling full 3D rotation including pitch and roll axes beyond basic yaw rotation.
player_impact: Gives maximum building flexibility for complex shapes and angled decorations.

layman_description: The type of backpack or container that appears on the ground when you kill this creature.
technical_description: Entity class identifier that determines spawned loot container type and visual appearance on death.
player_impact: Different zombies drop different colored backpacks indicating the quality of loot inside.

layman_description: How fast this creature walks normally and runs when chasing you.
technical_description: Movement speed values for idle and aggro states separated by comma for AI locomotion calculations.
player_impact: Determines if you can outrun enemies or need to fight them when detected.

layman_description: Removes placement restrictions so you can put this block anywhere without needing solid ground beneath it.
technical_description: Boolean flag that bypasses standard placement validation checks for collision and stability requirements.
player_impact: Lets you place decorations floating in air or in unusual positions for creative building.

layman_description: Prevents this block from showing simplified distant versions, always rendering in full detail.
technical_description: Boolean flag that disables LOD system mesh swapping to maintain visual quality at all distances.
player_impact: Keeps important structures looking good from far away at the cost of some performance.

layman_description: Whether this item displays quality level stars in your inventory indicating its tier and stats.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling quality tier display and associated stat scaling calculations for item.
player_impact: Tools and weapons with quality show stars indicating better damage and durability on higher tiers.

layman_description: How many seconds it takes to break down this item into raw materials at a workbench.
technical_description: Duration override in seconds for scrapping action, replacing default time calculation based on item value.
player_impact: Controls how long you spend recycling items into resources at crafting stations.

layman_description: How easy or hard it is to blow off this creature's head compared to normal.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied to head dismemberment threshold calculations for decapitation mechanics.
player_impact: Lower values make headshots more effective for instant kills on zombies.

layman_description: How easy or hard it is to blow off this creature's legs to slow it down.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied to leg dismemberment threshold calculations for crippling mechanics.
player_impact: Lower values make leg shots more effective for creating crawling zombies.

layman_description: Whether this decoration automatically tilts to match sloped terrain underneath it.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling mesh rotation alignment to terrain surface normal for natural placement.
player_impact: Makes plants and rocks sit naturally on hills instead of floating or tilting awkwardly.

layman_description: How much damage this block begins with when first placed in the world.
technical_description: Initial damage value applied on block placement before any external damage sources are applied.
player_impact: Used for creating pre-damaged structures in world generation that appear worn or destroyed.

layman_description: What this block upgrades into when you use the right materials and tools to improve it.
technical_description: Block identifier for upgrade path transitions when upgrade action is performed with required resources.
player_impact: Shows what you can upgrade basic frames into using wood, cobblestone, concrete, or steel.

layman_description: How easy or hard it is to shoot off this creature's arms to reduce its attack power.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied to arm dismemberment threshold calculations for limb removal mechanics.
player_impact: Lower values make arm shots more effective for weakening zombie melee attacks.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you draw this weapon from your inventory to your hands.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered during equip animation when item transitions to held state.
player_impact: Provides audio feedback confirming you successfully equipped your weapon or tool.

layman_description: How close you need to be before this block appears, with lower values showing up from farther away.
technical_description: Distance multiplier for level-of-detail culling calculations determining when block renders.
player_impact: Affects when decorations pop into view as you approach, balancing visuals with performance.

layman_description: Which material you need to repair this item's durability at a workbench.
technical_description: Resource item identifier required as consumable material for item repair operations.
player_impact: Stone tools need stone to repair, metal tools need repair kits, limiting field repairs without materials.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you put this weapon away back into your inventory.
technical_description: Audio event identifier triggered during unequip animation when item transitions from held to stored state.
player_impact: Makes a satisfying sound when sheathing weapons or storing tools.

layman_description: The maximum distance in blocks from your character where you can place this block.
technical_description: Ray cast distance limit for block placement validation from player position to target location.
player_impact: Lets you build far away with land claim blocks but forces close placement for most building blocks.

layman_description: Whether this decoration can spawn naturally on sloped terrain during world generation.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling placement validation on non-horizontal surfaces during terrain decoration passes.
player_impact: Allows plants and rocks to appear on hills and mountains instead of only flat ground.
